hadiths.text: Hakam b. 'Araj reported:I asked Ibn Abbas (Allah be pleased with them) as he was reclining using his cloak as a pillow near Zamzam about fasting on 'Ashura. The rest of the hadith is the same

chapter.ara-name: باب أَىُّ يَوْمٍ يُصَامُ فِي عَاشُورَاءَ
chapter.eng-name: Which day should be fasted for 'Ashura?
